name: DhallToYamlNg
help: Dhall is a programmable configuration language that you can think of as: JSON + functions + types + imports

properties.name: OmitEmpty
properties.help: Omit record fields that are null or empty records

properties.name: PreserveNull
properties.help: Preserve record fields that are null

properties.name: Documents
properties.help: If given a Dhall list, output a document for every element. Each document, including the first one, will be preceded by "---", even if there is only one document. If not given a list, output a single document (as if it were a list of one element)

properties.name: Quoted
properties.help: Prevent from generating not quoted scalars

properties.name: Key
properties.help: Reserved key field name for association lists

properties.name: Value
properties.help: Reserved value field name for association lists

properties.name: NoMaps
properties.help: Disable conversion of association lists to homogeneous maps

properties.name: File
properties.help: Read expression from a file instead of standard input

properties.name: Output
properties.help: Write YAML to a file instead of standard output

properties.name: GeneratedComment
properties.help: Include a comment header warning not to edit thegenerated file
